definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Shall I fix you a plastic crown?
sentences.chinese: 我給你裝一個塑料牙套好嗎？

sentences.english: David got braces for his lower teeth.
sentences.chinese: 大衛幫下面的牙齒裝了牙套。

sentences.english: A student who wears braces on his teeth is obviously under the care of an orthodontist.
sentences.chinese: 要是學生戴着牙套說明他正在看正牙醫生。

sentences.english: In severe cases, walking braces or night splints may be used.
sentences.chinese: 在嚴重的情況下，步行牙套或夜間夾板可使用。

sentences.english: He comes in religiously every six months to have his grillz cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 他十分準確地每六個月來一趟清洗他的牙套。

definition: to fill a tooth (cavity)/to have a tooth filled/a dental filling
to have a false tooth set in/denture
to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
